component.description:
The EdgeX Device Camera is a device service for communicating with ONVIF-compliant cameras via EdgeX. It can be used to get and set camera attributes and retrieve snapshot images.
**Snap usage instructions** https://github.com/edgexfoundry/device-camera-go/blob/main/snap/README.md
**Source code and more info** https://github.com/edgexfoundry/device-camera-go
**EdgeX documentation** https://docs.edgexfoundry.org
**Reference platform snap** https://snapcraft.io/edgexfoundry
